Uses of Class
oracle.kubernetes.weblogic.domain.v1.DomainSpec

  • Packages that use DomainSpec 
    Package Description
    oracle.kubernetes.operator.helpers
    Helper classes that provide easy access to various Kubernetes features.
    oracle.kubernetes.operator.wlsconfig
    Classes used to retrieve configuration of a WebLogic Domain or health from individual servers.
    oracle.kubernetes.weblogic.domain.v1
    Model classes that are part of the WebLogic Custom Resource extensions to the Kubernetes API.

      boolean WlsDomainConfig.validate(DomainSpec domainSpec, List<ConfigUpdate> suggestedConfigUpdates)
      Checks the provided k8s domain spec to see if it is consistent with the configuration of the WLS domain.
